APP_ID.description: A unique identifier for your app.

PORT.description: The port to run the ParseServer. defaults to 1337.

PARSE_SERVER_DATABASE_URI.description: The full URI to your mongodb database

PARSE_SERVER_DATABASE_OPTIONS.description: Options to pass to the mongodb client

PARSE_SERVER_COLLECTION_PREFIX.description: A collection prefix for the classes

PARSE_SERVER_URL.description: URL to your parse server with http:// or https://.

PARSE_PUBLIC_SERVER_URL.description: Public URL to your parse server with http:// or https://.

PARSE_SERVER_CLIENT_KEY.description: Key for iOS, MacOS, tvOS clients

PARSE_SERVER_WEBHOOK_KEY.description: Key sent with outgoing webhook calls

PARSE_SERVER_CLOUD_CODE_MAIN.description: Full path to your cloud code main.js

PARSE_SERVER_PUSH.description: Configuration for push, as stringified JSON. See https://github.com/ParsePlatform/parse-server/wiki/Push

PARSE_SERVER_OAUTH_PROVIDERS.description: Configuration for your oAuth providers, as stringified JSON. See https://github.com/ParsePlatform/parse-server/wiki/Parse-Server-Guide#oauth

PARSE_SERVER_FACEBOOK_APP_IDS.description: Comma separated list for your facebook app Ids

PARSE_SERVER_ENABLE_ANON_USERS.description: Enable (or disable) anon users, defaults to true

PARSE_SERVER_ALLOW_CLIENT_CLASS_CREATION.description: Enable (or disable) client class creation, defaults to true

PARSE_SERVER_MOUNT_PATH.description: Mount path for the server, defaults to /parse

PARSE_SERVER_FILES_ADAPTER.description: Adapter module for the files sub-system

PARSE_SERVER_EMAIL_ADAPTER.description: Adapter module for the email sending

PARSE_SERVER_VERIFY_USER_EMAILS.description: Enable (or disable) user email validation, defaults to false

PARSE_SERVER_PREVENT_LOGIN_WITH_UNVERIFI.description: Prevent user from login if email is not verified and PARSE_SERVER_VERIFY_USER_EMAILS is true, defaults to false

PARSE_SERVER_LOGGER_ADAPTER.description: Adapter module for the logging sub-system

PARSE_SERVER_CUSTOM_PAGES.description: custom pages for pasword validation and reset

PARSE_SERVER_REVOKE_SESSION_ON_PASSWORD_.description: When a user changes their password, either through the reset password email or while logged in, all sessions are revoked if this is true. Set to false if you don't want to revoke sessions.
